Current trends, however, remain too short-term in nature to make any major business decisions, such as shifting procurement or adopting new policies on foreign exchange, Sergio Marchionne said. A full-size front-wheel or all-wheel-drive sedan and even some Fiat brand vehicles also could be part of that family. The architecture would be a lot more capable and allow us to make a minivan-like vehicle as well as others, Sergio Marchionne said. The family would be part of a larger goal of getting 80 percent of its vehicles from four or five architectures, a path he said Chrysler is just starting now.``
